text:
María Baxa (15 April 1946 – 14 November 2019) was a Croatian-born Italian-Serbian movie actress and model. She was born in Osijek, Croatia. She was known for her roles in Sex comedy movies. Her best known roles include: "Sex with a Smile II", "Deadly Chase" and "Candido Erotico".
Baxa died at her apartment in Belgrade, Serbia on 14 November 2019 at the age of 73.
